caption.p: ( a) Antioxidant activity of the yoghurt sample from cow milk with the addition of volatile basil oil encapsulated in sodium alginates on the first day, the 10th day and the 20th day; ( b) Decline on day 10 and day 20 for the yoghurt sample from cow milk with the addition of volatile basil oil encapsulated in sodium alginates compared to day one.
